games.space

Class Asteroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.space.Asteroid

  • public class Asteroid
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an Asteroid containing an answer to the corresponding Space game's question, to be touched by the player's astronaut.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Asteroid(Question question, int ans, float x, float y)
      Creates a new Asteroid object with the following parameters, a width of 125 pixels, and a height of 75 pixels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Asteroid

        public Asteroid(Question question,
                int ans,
                float x,
                float y)
        Creates a new Asteroid object with the following parameters, a width of 125 pixels, and a height of 75 pixels.
        Parameters:
        question - the Question of the corresponding Space game
        ans - the answer to Question that this Asteroid holds
        x - the x-coordinate of the asteroid
        y - the y-coordinate of the asteroid

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Draws this asteroid on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet onto which this asteroid will be drawn

        the x-coordinate of the asteroid

        public float getHeight()
        Returns:
        the height of the asteroid

      • isTop

        public boolean isTop()
        Returns:
        true if the asteroid's initial position is at the top half of the screen, false if it is at the bottom half

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(float x,
                   float y)
        Moves the asteroid to a new coordinate (x, y)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-value of the new coordinate
        y - the y-value of the coordinate

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(float width)
        Sets the width of the asteroid
        Parameters:
        width - the new width value

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(float height)
        Sets the height of the asteroid
        Parameters:
        height - the new height value

      • isEllipseInside

        public boolean isEllipseInside(float x,
                               float y,
                               float width,
                               float height)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the ellipse
        y - the y-coordinate of the ellipse
        width - the width of the ellipse
        height - the height of the ellipse
        Returns:
        true if an ellipse at point (x, y) with dimensions width and height respectively has at least one common point with this asteroid.
